Title: International Assassin
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Damon Lindelof, Nick Cuse
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Liv Tyler
Plot: In the wake of Kevin's desperate decision to vanquish Patti, questions and answers emerge as the world adjusts to the repercussions of what comes next.
